title: Top Screw & Fastener Supplier in Riyadh — MOJAF
description: Looking for a reliable screw supplier in Riyadh? MOJAF delivers industrial fasteners for construction, MEP, and fit‑out projects.
body:
Looking for a reliable screw supplier in Riyadh? MOJAF delivers industrial fasteners for construction, MEP, and fit‑out projects.

As a KSA‑wide supplier, MOJAF supports contractors in Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, and Al Khobar with vetted products, fair pricing, and reliable logistics. We coordinate specifications, datasheets, and matched accessories so installation is fast and error‑free.

Specifications & Options:
• Certified quality and consistent batches
• Multiple sizes and finishes in stock
• Matched trims, tapes, adhesives, and fixings
• Technical guidance for submittals and site teams

Applications:
• Residential towers, villas, and hospitality
• Retail fit‑outs and healthcare facilities
• Educational and governmental projects
• Industrial plants and warehouses

Ordering & Delivery:
Request a same‑day quote. We consolidate multi‑category orders and ship across Saudi Arabia. WhatsApp: +966 56 840 1900 — Email: info@mojaf-sa.com
